page.title: 03House Prices in Collingham
page.content: Here is a representative sample of current{house prices} {Older Houses }Old Hall-5 Reception,4 Beds,Flat,Stables,many facilities Â£150,000.Old Barn-2R,4B,2 Garages,Paddock Â£69,000.Holly Cottage-2R,3B,4 Utilites,Large garden Â£56,000.Counting House-2R,3B,G,Small garden Â£36,000.Sialkot-2R,2B,Small garden Â£24,000 {Modern Houses}Alpha House-4R,5B,2G Â£75,000.25,Lawns-2R,3B,G Â£52,750 2,Paddock-2R,4B,G Â£43,000. 63,Swinderby Rd.-2R,4B,G Â£32,250 14,Crewe Rd.-1R,2B,G Â£23,950. There has been extensive housing development in Collingham.There is also a large{council estate}and an{old {people's home}.This reflects the wide social mix within the village.
